name: Slime Strider
description: Slime Strider is a game about shooting intergalactic slimes. Made with the marvelous Godot Game Engine, Slime Strider is in Alpha, as the dev plan to add a few QoL and bug fixing to the game before a 1.00 release. Slime Strider is planned to be ported to Web, Desktop, iOS, and Android.
